layout_structure: The screen features a top app bar with a title and back navigation. Below the app bar, form fields are stacked vertically, grouped by their respective labels. Two date input fields are arranged horizontally side-by-side. A full-width primary action button is fixed at the bottom of the screen. The overall layout is clean, with generous vertical spacing between sections, following a single-column flow for most elements.

typography.font_family: Sans-serif (consistent throughout, likely a single family)

spacing_and_density.vertical_spacing: Generous, clear separation between form sections and labels.
spacing_and_density.horizontal_spacing: Consistent padding for content within the main container. Balanced spacing between horizontal elements (e.g., date inputs).
spacing_and_density.element_padding: Ample internal padding within input fields, making them easy to tap and read.
spacing_and_density.corner_radius: Consistent use of medium-sized rounded corners (e.g., ~8-12dp) on all input fields and the primary button.
spacing_and_density.density: Low to medium density, prioritizing readability and tap target size over displaying maximum information at once, suitable for form input.

accessibility_observations: Good use of clear labels above each input field, which aids screen readers and overall comprehension.
Tap targets for input fields and the button appear to be sufficiently large for touch interaction.
High contrast between white text labels and the dark purple background. Gold text on dark purple also appears to have good contrast.
Potential contrast issue with light gray placeholder text on the dark purple input background, especially for users with low vision or in bright lighting conditions.
Icons (back, calendar, dropdown arrows) are distinct and convey their purpose clearly.

The primary button's dark text on a gradient gold background might need to be checked with a color contrast analyzer to ensure WCAG AA or AAA compliance, as gradients can sometimes complicate contrast calculations.
notable_patterns: Standard mobile app bar with title and back navigation.
Vertical stacking form layout for sequential data input.
Two-column layout for related short input fields (Check-in/Check-out Date), optimizing screen space.
Dedicated icons for interactive input types (calendar for date picker, dropdown arrow for selection).
Prominent, full-width primary call-to-action button fixed at the bottom of the screen, common for form submission.
Consistent visual style (rounded corners, dark themed input fields) across all form elements.
Implicit dark mode design with a dark background and contrasting accent colors.
